# Preliminaries

## Load packages

```{r setup, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
here::i_am("analysis/rnng_rt.Rmd")
library(here)
library(tidyverse) # for data processing
library(knitr)
# library(lmerTest)
```

```{r}
df_rtsurp <- read_tsv(here("data/rt-surp.tsv"))

df_rtsurp <- df_rtsurp %>% 
  rename(isurp = "indep-surp",
         rt = "reading-time")

```

```{r}

p_rtsurp <- ggplot(
 df_rtsurp,
  aes(y = rt, x = isurp)
) +
  geom_point(
    stat = "identity"
  ) +
  geom_smooth(method = lm, level = 0.99) +
  ggtitle("title")
p_rtsurp

```
